Articles.Content:
Behold, my very first publicly released mobile missile launcher called the Juniorlista!

Note: Spoiler tags are currently broken. So, I'm unable to conceal the image into any spoiler tag.

Download Link: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24250760/KSP%20Ships/Juniorlista%20Launcher.craft

Pressing '1' will launch the missile. Do not ever press 'space' or it will flip over. This configuration is excellent for hitting targets closer range (rated at just over 1.2km for this configuration). However, I have gotten configurations (by adjusting the angle of the launcher itself) well over that. Feel free to tweak the launcher to adjust the possible ranges the missile can travel. Heck, feel free to even use liquid fuel (provided you are careful).

Feel free to call this a nice short-ranged miniature missile launcher.

Warning: When moving, be extremely careful making turns with this launcher or you will topple over.

Edited April 20, 2013 by Bandock
Adding a warning.
I think I've made something before...

I think I've made something before...

Very nicely constructed Kalawang.

Yeah, I have been experimenting with mobile launchers in the past, but never quite felt right. With the inclusion of structural beams and rover wheels, now it feels proper. Thinking about building a larger one.

I really like the concept but I would like to see maybe a much larger vehicle with multiple shots such as a Walking Stuka (http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS_Nev6kYt6EorPTH64hXHAIEf8dxQy50aVYWwrHc8qlPjH4DoHOw)
Yeah, I have been thinking about building a missile launcher that can shoot several missiles (even larger ones) as well as a larger design.
